title: Worlds 2018 Viewing Party
body:
Went to worlds at Event cinemas at Marion (South Australia) and was really disappointed to find no skin code got everything else but a skin code and even the staff were confused when I asked about it any help? 

I have also checked my emails constantly and still nothing.

replies.body:
Yea the staff should have known about this, but the skin codes are intended to be sent out after the event via email (planned for this week).
Check out this [response from Achenar ](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/b3Eyejer-bad-viewing-experience-and-false-advertisement)for more info.
